content.html: my teen is now balking at applying for summer jobs because he just did the math on what 40 hours a week actually is "what?! that's way too many hours! how are people supposed to do anything else?" honestly, he's not wrong
content.value:
my teen is now balking at applying for summer jobs because he just did the math on what 40 hours a week actually is

"what?! that's way too many hours! how are people supposed to do anything else?"

honestly, he's not wrong
